column5: This is the first article I've written in a while. What can I say, on vacation, stuck indoors today.. just started typing about what I was thinking about! lol Let me know what you think.
Good read, thanks for the tips!
excellent read Rich....  have u considered apply for work in an editorial field of some sort ?
Very interesting Rich. Thanks for the tips  I'll settle for catching any sized pike through the ice. No luck so far

Thank you sir!  I've definitely considered it but there's bigger things on the horizon ;-)  Thanks everyone for your comments. Seems at least there's no dislikes or bashing so it must have been written pretty well. LOL
I love it!! Well done sir    Sardines are already in the freezer, and I'm picking up some fluoro and trebles today....holes will be drilled in less than 24 hours
Lots of good info in that article Rich Great job dude
Great read! Thanks for spend the time to write down all your thoughts.  I have something to try while i'm perch fishing
Thanks for the tips, I hope to give them a shot tomorrow!
